Thanatotic titans served as assassins in the war against the deities. They learned to sever their targets' divine connections, murdering mortal priests and divine heralds alike. Thanatotic titans were locked away in the [Abyss](/Planes.aspx?ID=13), but some have freed themselves and crept out from the Abyss so they might continue their sprees of murder and mayhem. To this day, they seek out the faithful for slaughter. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 49 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 47 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 44 [Thanatotic Titan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1340) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 268, [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 83 **Perception** +36; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +45, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +41, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +36, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +38, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +38, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +36 **Str** +10 **Dex** +4 **Con** +9 **Int** +8 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +8 **Items** _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [halberd](/Weapons.aspx?ID=26)_ --- **AC** 46 **Fort** +37 **Ref** +34 **Will** +35 +4 status to all saves vs. [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) or [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) **HP** 540 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) **Impossible Stature** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 100 feet. Titans warp perception and distance around them to seem even larger and more imposing. A creature that enters or begins its turn within the emanation must succeed at a DC 45 Will save or its movement toward the titan is movement over difficult terrain (greater difficult terrain on a critical failure) for 1 round.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** The titan can use their Attack of Opportunity when a creature within their reach uses a [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) action, in additional to its normal trigger. They disrupt actions on any hit, not just a critical hit— including triggering concentrate actions. --- **Speed** 40 feet; [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) **Melee** _halberd_ +42 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 4d10+25 piercing **Melee** foot +39 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d8+20 bludgeoning **Ranged** rock +39 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 200 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 3d12+20 bludgeoning **Divine Innate Spells** DC 45 - **5th** [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272) - **6th** [Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=268) (×3) - **7th** [Spell Turning](/Spells.aspx?ID=297) - **8th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (at will), [Spiritual Epidemic](/Spells.aspx?ID=304) (at will), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (at will) - **10th** [Massacre](/Spells.aspx?ID=186), [Meteor Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=191) - **Constant (10th)** [Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Divine Rituals** DC 45 - **5th** [Planar Ally](/Rituals.aspx?ID=16), [Resurrect](/Rituals.aspx?ID=20) **Godslayer** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Trigger** The titan damages a creature capable of using [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) spells or abilities;**Effect** The creature must attempt a DC 45 Will save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature can't use divine spells or abilities for 1 round and is [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19). Only powerful non-divine magic, such as [_wish_](/Spells.aspx?ID=377), can undo this effect.
**Failure** As success, but the duration is 1 minute.
**Critical Failure** As success, but the duration is unlimited. **[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) If a titan's rock Strike isn't a critical failure, the rock explodes, dealing 10d6 damage of a damage type of the titan's choice to all creatures in a 20-foot burst (DC 45 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). **Titanic Charge** The titan Strides twice and makes a melee Strike. If the Strike hits, the titan can cast [_earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95) centered on the target as a free action. **[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** Huge or smaller, foot, DC 45 **Wide Cleave** The titan makes a melee weapon Strike against each foe within their reach. This counts as three attacks for the titan's multiple attack penalty.
